wikipedia_page.main: Stan Keery (9 September 1931 – 7 March 2013) was an English professional footballer who played as a wing half.

response: * 7 March 2013: Stan Keery, 81, former Shrewsbury Town, Newcastle United, Mansfield Town and Crewe Alexandra wing half.
